text: Hey team! I wear a lot of hats at my company, but soon I’ll be taking on the construction of our new website from tip to tail. I’m going to do as much of it on HS as possible because it seems so handy, maintainable, and super useful. But, I’m basically brand new to it so, I’m going to have to make a lot of friends here!
woot woot - happy to hear you're enjoying and going all in! :slightly_smiling_face: Keep it up and let us know how we can help
